DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of Crestor (rosuvastatin) and (Lipitor) atorvastatin on urinary protein excretion over 1 year in patients with Type 1 or 2 diabetes with moderate proteinuria and hypercholesterolaemia.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Proteinuria and Renal Function in Diabetic Patients With Progressive Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: hyperlipidemia urinary protein diabetes previous rosuvastatin treatment < 6 months prior to Visit 1 statin intolerance severe hypertension
